participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Driven and ambitious, Emily is focused on her studies and future career in physical therapy. She is also confident and enjoys participating in school events.
participant_1.background: i make straight as in school. i am currently in high school. my current goal is to run a k. when i grow up i want to be a physical therapist. i won homecoming queen this year.

participant_2.name: Oliver
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, Oliver has a deep connection with nature and animals. He often feels melancholic around the holidays but finds joy in his hobbies.
participant_2.background: i spend my time bird watching with my cats. i'm an animal activist. the holidays make me depressed. my age is too old to say.
